meanings.definition: The part of a shirt that covers the arm.
meanings.sent1: He rolled up his shirtsleeves to wash the dishes.
meanings.sent2: The tailor carefully stitched the shirtsleeve onto the shirt.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy tugged on the shirtsleeve during playtime.
meanings.sent4: Her shirtsleeve fluttered in the wind like a flag of freedom.
meanings.sent5: The shirtsleeve shielded his skin from the scorching sun.

meanings.definition: Wearing only a shirt with no jacket or coat.
meanings.sent1: The man enjoyed the shirtsleeve weather during the warm summer.
meanings.sent2: She felt comfortable in her shirtsleeve attire at the casual party.
meanings.sent3: The shirtsleeve outfit made him feel like a laid-back beachgoer.
meanings.sent4: Her shirtsleeve look was as effortless as a breeze on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: He embraced the shirtsleeve style for its simplicity and ease.
